Name: Creation Date - Earliest
Description: This field is used to record the earliest possible date for the creation of the documented physical object.

Name: Creation Date - Latest
Description: This field is used to record the latest possible date for the creation of the documented physical object.

Name: Creation Location
Description: This field is used to record the place of the creation of the documented physical object.

Name: Creation Period
Description: This field is used to record the historical period in which the creation of the documented physical object occurred.
